MultiLanDefine.ERROR_ATTACHED_SAME_DLP_STR: /B20/C10/YITIJI系列输出需关联到同一个大屏上且独占该大屏
MultiLanDefine.ERROR_WND_NOT_SUPPORT_AMPLAY: The window does not support analog output on video wall.
MultiLanDefine.ERROR_NOT_SURPORT_OPEN_WND_STR: This type of windowing is not supported.
MultiLanDefine.ERROR_NOT_SURPORT_TRANS_PLAY_STR: Transparent transmission is not supported to display on video wall.
MultiLanDefine.ERROR_NO_MIXJOINT_STR: For different type, linkage is not supported.
MultiLanDefine.ERROR_NO_BNCJOINT_STR: For BNC type, linkage is not supported.
MultiLanDefine.ERROR_ONLY_ONE_SOUND_WND_STR: For on output, only one channel audio can be enabled.
MultiLanDefine.ERROR_BASEPIC_OPERATION_STR: Background picture operation failed. Error code %s
MultiLanDefine.ERROR_MONITOR_NOT_ATTACHED_STR: Monitor %s is not link to any output camera.
MultiLanDefine.ERROR_WRONG_NOMATCH_WND_INPUT_STR: Please operate on the window and analog input source from one device.
MultiLanDefine.ERROR_NOSUPPORT_AUDIO_STR: Device does not support audio function.
MultiLanDefine.ERROR_DEVICE_OFFLINE_STR: Device is offline. You cannot operate it now.
MultiLanDefine.ERROR_MONITOR_UNUSABLE: The output with same serial No. cannot be used at the same time.
MultiLanDefine.ERROR_LAST_MONITOR_STR: The linkage cannot be canceled when there is any window opening.
MultiLanDefine.ERROR_GB_OPEN_WND_NS_STR: 国标解码器不支持开窗
MultiLanDefine.ERROR_GB_CLOSE_WND_NS_STR: 国标解码器不支持关窗
MultiLanDefine.ERROR_GB_LAY_OPR_NS_STR: 国标解码器不支持图层操作
MultiLanDefine.ERROR_B10_BNC_JOINT_ERROR_STR: B10设备同一DSP中只支持第一个BNC拼接
MultiLanDefine.LAN_RIGHTMENU_LOCAL_STOP: Stop Local Desktop on Video Wall
